name: phonebookbackend
description: node and Express backend for phonebook

scripts.build:ui: cd ../phonebookFrontend && npm run build && cp -r dist ~/Dev/DevFullstack/DevPractice/part3/phonebook/phonebookBackend/
scripts.deploy: git add . && git commit -m 'complete build' && git push
scripts.deploy:full: npm run build:ui && git add . && git commit -m 'forDeploy after ui build' && git push
